title: Sorcerer
content:
ots Quarterstaff Health Potion x2, Scroll of Revivify

SORCERER SPELLCASTING

Full Spellcasters: Unlocks new spell level every 2 Sorcerer levels, up to level 6 spells. Cantrips: Starts with 4 Cantrips (gains additional cantrips at level 5 & 10) Spell Save DC: 8 + your Proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier Spell Attack Modifier: your Proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier Known Spells: 1 + your Sorcerer level Spell List: Known Casters. Cannot change equipped spells freely. Can only swap
